name: Collaboration des services de police ferroviaire ed de sécurité
goal:
COLPOFER is the association of railway security managers and railway/transport police forces.
Its mission is to ensure protection of persons, premises, trains and information within the railway system through a strong cooperation between railway police forces and railway companies security organisations.
This includes:
- the exchange of information and shared experiences between members in the fight against criminal activites within the railway environment;
- the defining of a common railway security strategy;
- the development of guidelines aimed at improving the security level within the railway environment and the public perception of security (customers, railway staff, contractors and suppliers).
The activites within the association are conducted through an operational collaboration based on internal communication between members on security issues which need to be resolved quickly and without formalities and an external collaboration with other organisations working on railway security, both from the public and private Sector.
COLPOFER raises all major operational issues encountered by their members' security forces to the European and International institutions.
COLPOFER is a Special Group of UIC (International Union of Railways)
interests: Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Home Affairs, Transport
euInitiatives: Railway security, critical infrastructure protection at a national and international level,
